entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023
